layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x62
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x62
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x46
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x46 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {caption} at (0,0) size 784x18 [bgcolor=#00FF00]
          LayoutText {#text} at (250,0) size 284x18
            text run at (250,0) width 209: "This caption should have a lime "
            text run at (458,0) width 76: "background"
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,19) size 782x26
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x22
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 778x22 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 24x18
                text run at (2,2) width 24: "cell"
